name: .PFR File Extension
summary: Learn about .PFR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Compact, platform-independent format for representing high-quality, scalable outline fonts; based on the TrueDoc PFR Specification developed by Bitstream, Inc; used for embedding rasterized fonts into Web pages and for displaying text on digital televisions.

content: The PFR font format is used by several organizations that set digital TV standards. These organizations include ATDC, DAVIC, DVB, DTG, MHP, and OCAP.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
